title: Topic 006 Question 004
body: A company attempts to implement just-in-time (JIT) access for a virtual machine (VM) named VM1.
The company reports that they are unable to complete the process.
You need to implement JIT access and test the deployment.
Which PowerShell cmdlets should you run? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
